byline.contributor: Javier Hernandez contributed reporting from Beijing, and Kiki Zhao contributed research from Beijing.

lead_paragraph: Anbang, which is in a bidding war for Starwood Hotels, is controlled by a murky group of interconnected companies and led by a reclusive chairman.

headline.print_headline: Hotel Bidder a Reclusive Dealmaker From China
headline.main: Starwood Bidder Is a Reclusive Chinese Insurer With Opaque Backing

snippet: Anbang, which is in a bidding war for Starwood Hotels, is controlled by a murky group of interconnected companies and led by a reclusive chairman.
abstract: Anband Insurance Group of China's intense bidding war with Marriott International over Starwood Hotels & Resorst has focused attention on company's reclusive chairman Wu Xiaohui, who has emerged as one of biggest names in global finance.
